title: Augusta County: William H. Dunlap to Elizabeth Rife, May 12, 1861
summary: William H. Dunlap writes to his sister Elizabeth Reife to tell her that his company will march to Harpers Ferry on Tuesday and that he may not see her again. He also tells of other soldiers visits home and watch duty.
keywords: Desertion/Leave, Camp Life, Troop Movement, American Civil War
